item.title: Authority data for private collections (and small cultural institutions)
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Since the beginning of the year, I have been adding Wikidata for various functions on my blogs…

item.title: Data Containers
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Even if it is not necessarily the intended use case, Docker makes it very easy to package large amounts of data with applications for simplified provisioning (such as APIs). This can be particularly helpful if, for example, standardisation data from different sources is to be merged for data enrichment.

item.title: Compress JSON for application bundles
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: For the video metadata of 911 TV there was an interesting challenge to solve…

item.title: GeoIP Tool
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Kibana visualisation with room plans needs data, e.g. from devices in a building. But the data has to come from somewhere…
